name: Beet Horseradish
keywords: beet, horseradish, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, spring

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beet in a medium pot, cover with water and bring to a boil. Simmer until the beet is easily pierced with a fork, about 1 hour. Cool, peel, then coarsely grate into a large bowl. Peel the horseradish and grate using a fine grater or food processor. In a small bowl, stir together the horseradish, vinegar, sugar and salt, then pour this over the beets and mix well.
